subject: Re: Details of my proposal
body:
Good Day Jasmine,

I write to confirm the receipt of your mail and I appreciate your time in
writing back with the zeal to partner with me, I will like you to read the
details carefully so that you will understand what we are doing, I am an
Auditor who resigned from the Standard Chartered Bank Plc England, United
Kingdom, but currently I have gone back to my country home in Africa for
circumstantial reasons because staying in England may jeopardize my chances
during this transaction process because all my colleagues and partners are
wondering the sudden resignation and relocation, so I want us to handle
everything legally clean without any traces.

Mind you that before I resigned from the Standard Chartered Bank Plc, there
was a particular fixed deposit account containing Sixty Four Million United
States Dollars that I noticed was unserviceable over a decade, but I keep
passing it over and over at the end of each annual auditing. While I take
my time to make investigations concerning the owner of the account, having
done this for a long time, I discovered that the owner late Mr. Clement
Philip is confirmed dead in an auto crash on one of his vacation to
Johannesburg South-Africa in 2010, though his base was in the UK while he
was on exile.

Considering the facts on what will happen to these Funds if after 15 years
the Bank and the British Government confirms he is dead leaving no next of
kin, the corrupt Bank Directors with some Political Gurus in the British
Government will divert these Funds for their selfish Political ambitions
causing crisis in Countries they have interest in controlling the leaders.
So to avoid this to happen, I had to travel to South Africa and went to the
Death Registry Commission and obtain his Death Certificate to enable me to
save these funds before the corrupt bank officials would share these funds
amongst themselves.

Be informed that I have gathered all the legal documents that will enable
me to save these Funds and also provide every legal backup that will enable
you to receive these Funds as an extended relative to the deceased client
after the Funds will be transferred to your bank account as an investment
Funds. All I need from you is your maximum cooperation, trust and
transparency in all that we are going to do. Be rest assured that this
transaction is 100% risk free because your presence would not be required
as I will hire the legal services of a resident Attorney who will represent
you and go for the claim. Once a Legal Affidavit of Claim is procured from
the High Court of Justice/Her Majesty Crown Court of Justice in your favor,
we are good to go for the final stage which is to get an approval for the
release of these Funds to be transferred to your designated bank account in
any of your choice and safe location.

My friend please feel free to ask questions where you are beyond
comprehension, but if all I have explained is OK with you, kindly send the
following information to me so that I will know more about my new partner.

1: Your valid identification copy:
2: Your current address:
3: Your company name and position:
4: Next of kin and address:
5: Your direct telephone numbers:

Upon the receipt of the above listed information, we shall speak over the
telephone and thereafter I will proceed to initiate the Legal Paperworks
and I shall send the proof of Funds with a copy of the client death
certificate for your perusal. Once again thank you for your understanding
and zeal of cooperation as I will be looking forward to hearing from you
very soon. I do not do skype or any of the social media platforms for my
security, I hope you will understand this point.

Sincerely,
Mr. Samuel Barcliff.
Tel: (+234) 80-6451-8166.


Dear Samuel Barcliff,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this email finds you well. I am
interested in learning more about the business opportunity you mentioned
regarding the dormant account of your late client.

Could you please provide me with some additional details about the fixed
deposit account? Specifically, I would like to know the approximate amount
of funds involved and any legal requirements or procedures that need to be
followed in order to repatriate the funds.

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Jasmine

subject: Re: Details of my proposal
body:
Dear Jasmine,

Thank you for your response and interest in partnering with me. I appreciate your willingness to learn more about the business opportunity I mentioned.

Regarding the fixed deposit account, it contains a total of Sixty Four Million United States Dollars. This amount has been noticed over the course of a decade during annual auditing at Standard Chartered Bank Plc. The owner of the account, Mr. Clement Philip, unfortunately passed away in an auto crash while on vacation in South Africa.

To prevent the corrupt bank officials and political figures from diverting these funds for their own selfish ambitions, I have obtained legal documents from the Death Registry Commission in South Africa that prove Mr. Philip's death. These documents will enable us to claim the funds as his extended relatives.

Rest assured that this process is risk-free, as we will hire a resident attorney who will represent you and handle all necessary legal procedures on your behalf. Once we procure a Legal Affidavit of Claim from the High Court of Justice Her Majesty Crown Court of Justice in your favor, we can proceed to get approval for the release of the funds to your designated bank account.

Before we proceed further, I kindly request you to provide me with some information about yourself:

1. Your valid copy
2. Your current address
3. Your company name and position
4. Next of kin and address
5. Your direct telephone numbers

Once I receive this information, we can discuss further details over the phone and initiate the necessary legal paperwork. I will also send you proof of funds along with a copy of Mr. Philip's death certificate for your perusal.

Thank you once again for your interest and cooperation in this matter. Please understand that for security reasons, I do not use Skype or any social media platforms.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,
Mr.

Best wishes,
Jasmine
